nl.weeaboo.vn.core

Interface IContextManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRenderEnvConsumer, IUpdateable, java.io.Serializable

    public interface IContextManager
extends java.io.Serializable, IUpdateable, IRenderEnvConsumer
    Manages the active IContext and context lifetimes.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface nl.weeaboo.vn.core.IUpdateable

        EMPTY

      • getActiveContexts

        java.util.Collection<? extends IContext> getActiveContexts()
        Returns:

      • getPrimaryContext

        @Nullable
IContext getPrimaryContext()
        Returns the 'most important' active context, or null if no context is active.

      • setContextActive

        void setContextActive(IContext context,
                      boolean active)
        Activates/deactivates the given context.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given context isn't registered with this context manager.
